meanings.definition: An underground room or vault used for burial.
meanings.sent1: The ancient crypt held the remains of many kings and queens.
meanings.sent2: Visitors to the church were in awe of the crypt beneath the altar.
meanings.sent3: The crypt was so full of secrets, it seemed like a mysterious treasure trove.
meanings.sent4: The crypt of memories in her mind was a dark and haunting place.
meanings.sent5: The crypt echoed with the whispers of the past, a silent witness to history.

meanings.definition: A subterranean chamber or vault, especially one beneath the main floor of a church, used as a burial place.
meanings.sent1: The crypt beneath the cathedral was dimly lit and solemn.
meanings.sent2: The ancient crypt was a place of reverence and reflection.
meanings.sent3: The crypt was so quiet, it felt like a hidden sanctuary underground.
meanings.sent4: The crypt of forgotten dreams lay undisturbed beneath the church.
meanings.sent5: The crypt was a place where time stood still, preserving memories for eternity.
